front.title: 3GPP QoS Model for Networks Using 3GPP QoS Classes

abstract.t: This draft describes an NSIS QoS Model (QOSM) based on 3GPP QoS classes and bearer service attributes. Specifically, this draft describes additional optional parameters for QSPEC which carries 3GPP QOSM specific information and how the QSPEC information should be processed in QNEs.
